quotes.cn: 对明天做好的准备就是今天做到最好！
quotes.en: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.

quotes.cn: 改变了自己的思想就改变了自己的环境！
quotes.en: Change your thoughts and you change your world.

quotes.cn: 如果你想要成功，不要去追求成功；尽管做你自己热爱的事情并且相信它，成功自然到来！
quotes.en: Don't aim for success if you want it; just do what you love and believe in, and it will come naturally.

quotes.cn: 知识改变命运，英语成就未来！
quotes.en: Knowlegde can change your fate and English can accomplish your future.

quotes.cn: 一次只做一件事，做到最好！
quotes.en: Do one thing at a time, and do well.

quotes.cn: 不能充分掌握时间与区别事情的缓急先后，你的一切都会打折扣。
quotes.en: If you are not in good control of time or cannot set prioritiesfor different matters,what you do is surely to be rebated.

quotes.cn: 不要魂不守舍，不要匆忙行事。
quotes.en: Do not be restless;do not be hasty.

quotes.cn: 良好的开端是成功的一半。
quotes.en: A good beginning is half done.

quotes.cn: 戏谑不能化敌为友，只能使人失去朋友。
quotes.en: A joke never gains an enemy but loses a friend.

quotes.cn: 光说空话不做事，犹如花园光长刺。
quotes.en: A man of words and not of deeds is like a garden full of weeds.
